about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 196: Heroic Characters 37

Another group of Heroes and Heroines has come to save the day! This Collection of Cadres is 31 strong, featuring such magnificent members as a fire and ice warlock, poleaxe necromancer, and a savvy swashbuckling heroine! Surprise your heroes with a powerful pack of ready reinforcements today!
